projects.title: AgriTech AI
projects.desc: Developed an AI-powered agricultural advisory platform providing crop recommendations and disease prediction for farmers. Designed a modular architecture separating AI inference, database management, and user interface for scalability. Integrated Google Generative AI for Tamil-language guidance and Firebase Realtime Database for real-time synchronization.

projects.title: AI Communication Enhancer
projects.desc: Built an AI-driven platform to evaluate communication skills with automated scoring and feedback. Implemented live audio rooms using WebRTC with real-time transcription and speaker identification. Integrated TinyLlama LoRA models to analyze speech performance and generate intelligent improvement scores.

projects.title: Grocery Management System
projects.desc: Designed a normalized relational database schema for managing grocery inventory and stock levels. Implemented CRUD operations and generated reports for efficient inventory tracking. Ensured data integrity using constraints, keys, and relational design principles.
